DOC.brief_summary: Vulnerability psychologic distress induce situ simulation . Objectives : Psychological evaluation short long term work satisfaction , mental health , acute stress situ simulation . Analysis stress vulnerability induce simulation . Design : non interventional study . Primary outcome : Psychologic distress analysis validate psychologic distress inventory ( Job Satisfaction Survey ( JSS ) , General Health Quality ( GHQ ) , Impact Event Scale Revisited ( IESR ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory-A ( STAI-A ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory -B ( STAI-B ) ) .
DOC.criteria: team member : nurse , auxiliary nurse , resident , doctor , student non volunteer
